notes.text: We now ensure that the key is part of the $select in the value help request
The FieldControl annotation now works correctly in FieldGroups
We've fixed the issue related to an action not being triggered in specific cases
We now ensure manifest parameters 'allowedActions' and 'unavailableActions' are correctly handled for the additional semantic objects
We now ensure that the message dialog remains open if there are back-end errors for unbound and static actions
We've optimized the column width on Type-Ahead Tables and tables within the Value Help Dialog
We now provide an option to display a custom message in the message strip above the list report table
Revert - The i18n texts used in the message toast for the Create and Save scenarios of an object are no longer static
The FieldControl annotation now works correctly also when there's a property inside a navigation property
You can now use the Share to Microsoft Teams option
We now correctly transfer the focus of a Form label to the related input element
A Table building block using a PresentationVariant or SelectionPresentationVariant annotation now works correctly with custom columns and actions
A sortable custom column is now also groupable against the same property
We now pass the values of semantic date fields during external navigation
You can now mergeÂ user setting values from SAP Fiori launchpad with default values from annotations or the manifest
: In the object page and subobject page we now provide keyboard shortcuts to trigger forward path actions, that is, primary actions, such as 'Edit'
Bound transition messages with targets in the original dialog are now shown correctly
We now provide an option to skip the 'Create' pop-up dialog for new actions in specific cases
We've fixed export as PDF when custom columns are used
We've fixed the issue related to showing 'Contains Errors' in a table when a semantic key was used in a field group
We now ensure a list report with multiple views and no filter bar is displayed correctly
The edit status in the filter bar of the object page now works correctly
When navigating to an ObjectPage that has LongRunners requests, we now ensure that no data from previous contexts is displayed
We now ensure that the busy indicator is set correctly when a document is created
We now ensure that the resource model of SAP Fiori elements is loaded correctly
You can now execute the PrepareAction or global side effects by pressing Enter in draft mode
We now ensure the backslash is escaped before the input from the typeahead field is sent to the back end.
The i18n texts used in the message toast for the Create and Save scenarios of an object are no longer static
A grid table on an object page now has the correct number of rows
The issue related to duplicate labels for a navigation property has been resolved
We now ensure the Table building blocks in a subobject page work correctly
We no longer show a success toast message after the creation of an object if the back-end already provides a success message
We now use HeaderInfo annotations in the MessageBox of the 'Mass Edit' dialog
We've solved the issue related to the grouping of properties when the text arrangement was set to TextOnly
We now ensure that the message dialog remains open if there are back-end errors for unbound and static actions
We now close the object page if a refresh on the OData model removes its context
Messages for which the technicalDetails are defined are now correctly displayed on the UI
Semantic key fields are now shown correctly in the list report and object page
We now ensure navigation to an object page no longer occurs after a user selected both an invalid and a valid record in a list report and executed a bound action
We've now added minimum and maximum values to the comparison micro chart
The ControlConfiguration now supports multiple entity sets
We now provide a message strip in the header of an object page to notify about available messages
We now provide internationalization for the prefix used in the aggregatable properties of a chart
Sorting now works correctly on the column header of the value help dialog
We now hide the IBN (intent-based navigation) button when RequiresContext is false and an intent is not supported
We've solved the issue related to the endless busy indicator after the creation of a business object in the back end failed
The pageReady event is now correctly fired for an object page containing a table changed using the Key User Adaptation feature
We now provide the possibility to configure a handler function to control the visibility of actions
You can now define the layout property used by the form building block
The delete action now works when the title or description within the HeaderInfo uses dynamic expression
The semantic keys now is showing correct text arrangement
invokeAction now passes the parameter values and allows skipping the action parameter dialog
In a delete message, the issue with duplicate identifiers for the same key and description is now fixed
We now properly export the columns that contain dynamic date time values
We now support sorting of lineItems that have contacts
The pageReady event is now fired for an object page containing a filter bar, a table and a chart
We now ensure to refresh the action enablement after a patch event and the execution of a static action
We no longer apply the viewState if the appState data isn't available
We now ensure that the "availability" property of the line item annotation in a table is set correctly
We've fixed the issue related to the handling of transition message when updating a document
Revert "We've resolved an issue related to the 'add columns' functionality of the table"
We've resolved an issue related to the 'add columns' functionality of the table
We've resolved an issue related to the DataPoint that wasn't displayed as a link in the header of an object page
We now add semantic object mappings to the navigation parameters only if they are available
Data in the list report is now loaded correctly directly after refreshing the page
The Table building block no longer loads data on initialization if a filterBar is associated
We've fixed an issue related to the Share to Microsoft Teams icon
You can now use hidden properties as a sort order option for tables
External navigation now works correctly even for huge data sets
We now clear the default conditions for single valued filter fields before applying the iAppState
Commit to push the translation changes for: Revert - The i18n texts used in the message toast for the Create and Save scenarios of an object are no longer static
We now submit the pending changes correctly before navigating to the next context via the paginator
We've fixed an issue related to the 'Save as Tile' option not working correctly
We now ensure that the sort order defined within a presentation variant is properly set
We now support sorting and grouping on properties used in a textAnnotation that is set to #TextOnly
The quick view now saves the AppState only when necessary
Side effects now work correctly after an action was executed as an overload
We've resolved an issue related to the Export to PDF functionality when a column with DataFieldForAction was used
A Table building block using a PresentationVariant annotation without any visualizations now works correctly
We've resolved an issue related to the 'add columns' functionality of the table
We've resolved an issue related to a wrong label being read out for filters in the filter bar
Overload Actions that use the root context now run correctly
The shell navigation menu now has the correct URL parameters
We've fixed an issue related to the usage of percentage values
We now fixed an issue with action enablement on tables
The PresentationVariant is now correctly applied when using navigation properties for sorting and grouping
The object page is now correctly refreshed if you create or activate a draft using custom actions
The semantic keys are now properly evaluated  within a LineItem
We've resolved an issue related to static actions with the special 'ResultIsActiveEntity' parameter
We've resolved an issue related to inconsistencies of the page model cache
We now ensure that the quick filters are updated when a user switches to another variant
Semantic object mappings now are handled correctly
The isEditable property on the model UI now supports asynchronous binding
Default values for action parameters are now considered in the check for mandatory parameters
We now ensure the SetActionEnablement method doesn't break the app when a dynamic expression enables the action and no context data is passed
We've corrected the message handling for the action parameter dialog
We now use the correct i18n model for properties with text arrangement
We now use the correct i18n model for properties with text arrangement
Deleting items in the object page table no longer causes refresh issues  when using flexible column layout
We've resolved an issue where the navigation to an object page was stalled
We now ensure that draft instances are no longer displayed in the list report after the active instance was deleted from an object page using the flexible column layout
We now support filtering on tables that have multi-level navigation properties
We now ensure that the default SelectionVariant with Boolean values works correctly
We've resolved an issue regarding the 'Related Apps' button not appearing even after setting showRelatedApps to 'true'
We've fixed an issue with hiding data visualization titles for subsections that might be hidden dynamically
We've removed an unnecessary OData query that was sent when a draft document was saved in an app using the flexible column layout
We now correctly handle the criticality annotation when the navigation target is set in the manifest
We've improved the validation in the action parameter dialog to ensure the value state of the parameters are handled correctly
Columns with text arrangement set to TextOnly are now exported properly
The "Edit" and "Cancel" actions now work on the object page when a subobject page is opened using the flexible column layout
We have resolved an issue where invokeActionPromise was not resolved or rejected properly
We now ensure that the strict handling warning dialog is displayed correctly for actions with invocation grouping changeset
We've resolved an issue that occurs when removing the last value from custom filters using multi-value controls
SAP Fiori elements now properly exports units from associations
We now correctly manage the SelectionVariant annotation configured with the RangeSignType âExcludeâ for multiple views
We now ensure that selecting the begin button in an action parameter dialog only triggers the action once
We now ensure that the strict handling warning dialog is displayed correctly for actions with invocation grouping changeset
We've resolved an issue with the handling of 412 errors when the action is triggered using the chevron
Weâve resolved an issue where OData service was triggered twice for each sorting event in a table
We no longer show the technical messages from the default OData V4 model in the message dialog
